name: DESCO
details: DESCO provides electricity to the northern parts of Dhaka city.

name: DPDC
details: DPDC serves electricity to Dhaka South and nearby areas.

name: WASA
details: WASA is the primary provider of clean water in Dhaka.

name: Bakhrabad Gas
details: Bakhrabad Gas Distribution Company operates in Chattogram Division.

name: Titas Gas
details: Titas Gas is the leading gas distribution company in Bangladesh.

name: Link3
details: Link3 provides broadband and corporate internet solutions.

name: AmberIT
details: AmberIT offers home and business internet services nationwide.

name: Carnival Internet
details: Carnival Internet is known for stable residential internet in Bangladesh.

name: Jalalabad Gas
details: Jalalabad Gas provides natural gas services in Sylhet Division.

name: REB
details: Rural Electrification Board brings power to rural areas.

name: Palli Bidyut
details: Palli Bidyut provides electricity to remote and rural communities.

name: BanglaCAT
details: BanglaCAT offers power backup solutions through generators.

name: Summit Communications
details: Summit provides high-speed fiber-optic internet and data solutions.

name: Sheba.xyz
details: Sheba.xyz connects users with cleaning, plumbing, and AC repair services.

name: City Water Supply
details: City Water Supply ensures regular water delivery in urban zones.
